name: Chaos Penguin
description:
Welcome into Chaos Penguin!

In this entry for the Inaugural Gosu Jam, you will take the role of (obviously) the "Chaos Penguin"! It's up to you to destroy, ruin, and establish chaos in the peaceful kingdom of Penguinland.

Will you succeed in this chaotic task?

-- Controls --

  • Keyboard : 
    • X to Attack
    • Space to jump
    • Arrow keys to move
  • Controller (Xbox or Switch Pro controllers advised, but other works too!)
    • A to jump
    • X to attack
    • Joystick or D-Pad to move
